title: 一个让人愤怒的联机问题
author: 匿名
txt_content:
客户端服务端都是13w02b的，官方服务器开服，就是这个http://www.mojang.com/  
然后我开服了，朋友进去了
然后朋友开服，我进不去.....
我们开服的方法是先打开服务器exe，打开13w02b，多人游戏输入0.0.0.0：25565，登陆之后服务器exe会出现一个IP，退出0.0.0.0:25565，然后大家用新IP进去
为什么我开服别人可以进入，它开服我进去就显示Connection timed out：connect？




未命名.jpg (10.54 KB, 下载次数: 6)

下载附件

服务器
2013-1-14 22:10 上传





[INFO] Starting minecraft server version 13w02b
[INFO] Loading properties
[INFO] Default game type: SURVIVAL
[INFO] Generating keypair
[INFO] Starting Minecraft server on *:25565
[WARNING] **** SERVER IS RUNNING IN OFFLINE/INSECURE MODE!
[WARNING] The server will make no attempt to authenticate usernames. Beware.
[WARNING] While this makes the game possible to play without internet access, it also opens up the ability for hackers to connect with any username they choose.
[WARNING] To change this, set "online-mode" to "true" in the server.properties file.
[INFO] Preparing level "world"
[INFO] Preparing start region for level 0
[INFO] Done (0.798s)! For help, type "help" or "?"
[INFO] kyan[/192.168.0.2:52693] logged in with entity id 190 at (-674.086334503154, 81.0, 130.7933402350795)
[INFO] kyan lost connection: disconnect.quitting
[INFO] kyan[/192.168.0.2:52695] logged in with entity id 1636 at (-539.1965426609496, 77.0, 124.09621520842637)
[WARNING] Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded?
[WARNING] Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded?


  online-mode=flase改了，java运行环境也有
朋友的IP：192.168.0.2   今天晚上十一点左右关服，希望大家试试，还有它是电信的
我给他整整找了一个月的开服方法，都挂了。这是最后的希望了。跪求高手解释一下，提供一些建议线索都行，感激不尽

replies.author: motianjun4
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 motianjun4 于 2013-1-14 23:30 编辑 
东云 发表于 2013-1-14 23:17 
大神，怎么把内网的25565端口映射到外网？具体点
估计映射完之后就可以联机了吧（大概）
然后你就最佳答 ...
进路由器管理界面[地址是网关的IP,一般是192.168.1.1 http://192.168.1.1]
在转发规则 端口映射/虚拟服务器下[各厂商路由器有所不同]添加新条目
端口号是25565,ip地址是本机内网IP[格式是192.168.x.x]
确认后就可以了
[这是你朋友那边的设定= =]

replies.author: 东云
replies.txt_content:
motianjun4 发表于 2013-1-14 22:43 
请连接你朋友的外网IP
楼上，恳请解释下外网IP怎么开啊？

replies.author: motianjun4
replies.txt_content:
东云 发表于 2013-1-14 22:56 
楼上，恳请解释下外网IP怎么开啊？
可以先把内网的25565端口映射到外网,然后到www.ip.cn上查看外网IP
